info: 定义各种各样的动作, 如 eat, equip

extern.info:
Action = data, priority, instant, rmb, distance

- data: 用于扩展的数据
- priority
- instant
- rmb
- distance

Action:

- priority
- fn: #fn
- strfn
- testfn
- instant
- rmb
- distance
- mount_enabled
一系列的动作挂载在上面的 table

local.info:
doer, target => Boolean

target 是否处于 doer 的默认范围内

doer, dest => Boolean

与 @CheckFishingOceanRange 代码内容一致

act => any

- any: component 的返回值
